procedure.title: Downloading the client installer (Windows Agent)
procedure.para: To obtain the &agent; installer from &mybalabit;, complete the following steps:

The installers are available via &mybalabit;. In addition to the installers, a valid license is required to install the &abbrev; server. Contact your sales representative for access and license files.

step.para: Choose the latest available version (5.0.2 is used as an example).
Regardless of the path name, the installer contains both the 32-bit and the 64-bit binaries.
